entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
